scripts.analyze:vite:core: vite build --config config/vite/vite.config.core.js && vite build --config config/vite/vite.config.core.unmin.js
scripts.analyze:vite:full: vite build --config config/vite/vite.config.full.js && vite build --config config/vite/vite.config.full.unmin.js
scripts.analyze:all: npm run analyze:rollup:core && npm run analyze:rollup:full && npm run analyze:rollup:lazy && npm run analyze:vite:core && npm run analyze:vite:full && npm run analyze:vite:lazy && npm run analyze:webpack:core && npm run analyze:webpack:full && npm run analyze:webpack:lazy && npm run analyze:esbuild:core && npm run analyze:esbuild:full && npm run analyze:esbuild:lazy
scripts.report: npm run analyze:all && npm run compare
